title: Coronavirus: All sport in Italy suspended because of outbreak
description: All sport in Italy suspended until at least 3 April because of the coronavirus outbreak, the country's prime minister says.

title: Rodgers praises Leicester 'intensity' as Vardy scores twice in Villa thrashing
description: Leicester City manager Brendan Rodgers thought his side looked back to their best as Jamie Vardy ended his goal drought in a convincing win over Aston Villa.

title: Coronavirus: Devon school reopens after quarantine
description: Students return to a school in Devon which had closed for a week due to coronavirus.

title: Harry and Meghan's final royal duties before 'stepping back'
description: The couple are completing their last engagements before stepping back as working royals from 31 March.

title: Max Von Sydow: Eight of his most famous roles

title: Coronavirus: Italy in 'massive shock therapy' pledge to offset virus impact
description: The Italian economy takes a hit, as millions try to adapt to new coronavirus restrictions.

title: Portraits of Black Female Professors
description: An exhibition is being held to highlight the excellence of black female professors working in the UK.

title: Coronavirus: Boris Johnson to hold emergency Cobra meeting
description: Ministers will consider measures such as school closures and home working to delay the virus's spread.

title: Victims of police domestic abusers 'are powerless'
description: Campaigners, citing the cases of 19 women, say perpetrators can be protected from facing justice.

title: Alex Salmond trial on sex offence charges begins
description: The former SNP leader denies sexually assaulting 10 women while serving as Scotland's first minister.

title: Max Von Sydow: Actor dies aged 90
description: The actor appeared in more than 100 films and TV series, from The Exorcist to Game of Thrones.

title: Shares plunge in worst day since financial crisis

description: The removal of close relatives of the Saudi crown prince is fuelling much speculation and rumour.

title: London shooting: Knifeman shot dead by Westminster police
description: Police say the incident, in which a Taser was also fired, is "not being treated as terrorism".

title: PC Harper murder trial: Accused teens admit bike theft plot
description: Two teenagers accused of murdering PC Andrew Harper admit conspiracy to steal a quad bike.

description: The former EastEnders actor beat favourite Perri Kiely to be crowned the winner on Sunday night.

title: Harry and Meghan in last public engagement as working royals
description: The couple will join the Queen and other royals for the Commonwealth Day service at Westminster Abbey.

description: Sporting events in Britain are unlikely to be affected by coronavirus in the imminent future, says Culture Secretary Oliver Dowden.

description: BBC Sport reflects on the success of the T20 World Cup in Australia, with record attendances and increased funding helping the growth of the women's game.

title: Trevor Phillips suspended from Labour over Islamophobia allegations
description: The former chief of the UK's equality watchdog faces a probe and could be expelled from the party.

title: Coronavirus: Public urged not to stockpile
description: A government minister says there is "no need" for stockpiling, as worried shoppers clear shelves.

title: Coronavirus ship: Going 'stir crazy' on Grand Princess cruise
description: Margaret Bartlett is among 140 Britons on the Grand Princess, where 21 have contracted Covid-19.

description: Monday's papers express fears over flights arriving in the UK from virus hotspots in northern Italy.

title: Coronavirus: Foreigners leave N Korea on first commercial flight for weeks
description: One ambassador who had been quarantined for a month described the conditions as "morally crushing".

title: Coronavirus Australia: 'Did you cough at me?' row on Sydney train
description: A cough on a train in Sydney sparked a passive-aggressive row that's since gone viral.

description: Indian Wells - one of the leading events outside of the Grand Slams - is cancelled because of concerns about the spread of the coronavirus.

description: Watch the best bits, that you may have missed, from this weekend's Six Nations action, including some fiery hits and cringey parents.

title: Coronavirus: Italy death toll soars amid travel ban
description: Italy's coronavirus death toll jumps by 133 in a day to 366, as millions adapt to new restrictions.

title: 'A teacher joked about my stutter, now I help people with theirs'

description: A controversial public artwork returns to Australia’s capital for a balloon spectacular.

title: Coronavirus: 'Shaming' of Australia GP with virus angers doctors
description: The GP had been publicly rebuked for treating patients while unaware he had coronavirus.

title: Letter from Africa: The spread of coronavirus prejudice in Kenya
description: Before it recorded a single case of the virus, Kenya witnessed a number of anti-Chinese incidents.
